** As a ** [role],
** I want ** [an action or feature],
** So that ** [a reason or benefit].

** Acceptance Criteria **
- [ ] Criterion 1
- [ ] Criterion 2

** Definition of Done **
- [ ] Criteria met
- [ ] Implementation tickets created and assigned
